description.value: You notice things that others can't see at all. While you're adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] creature of your level or lower, it is instead only @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] from you. You only need a successful @Check[type:flat|dc:5] to target a hidden creature.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
